attributes.action: reveal the communist memberships present and past of members of labour party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all government members shoudl be obliged to reveal their political party memberships both past and present ie all previous communist party members. this is in order to ensure fairness in that members of other parties are judged by the general public with full knowledge of their political beliefs and loyalties. if the government do not provide the same openess about their members the publice are being denied relevant information on which they can judge the government members.
